messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Suit sensors, please. Thank you.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We require a HOP, if you're interested please come to the HOP line

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: For those of you who wanted to be HOP why did you run off from the line

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: After looking through our crew members, we need secuirty team members, please go to the HOP line to get a promotion

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We are still in need of secuirty members and a HOS

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Gravity Generator Room.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Flint, the Medical Doctor, to medbay please. Do not abandon your job.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Also: turn your sensors to maximum. We need to be able to find you in case of an emergency.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: W-We s-s-st-til-ll-l-l need m-mor-re s-sec-c m-mem-m-m-mber-rs, p-pl-lease c-com-me t-to t-t-the H-HOP-P l-lin-ne

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: We still have memebers of our crew without maxed sensors. Please turn them on.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: B-Bum-mb-b-b-bl-les j-jus-s-st kn-now-w, wh-h-h-her-re ev-ver y-you are. I l-l-lov-ve you c-cor-r-rg-gi b-boy-ye

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Virology.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Can we take a moment of silence for the best pupper, Bumble. It has been a whole fifteen minutes since I last saw the goodest of boys. PLease pray for the best pupper

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I NEED HELP IN MY OFFICE

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: SOME BREAK ME OUT OF MY OFFICE

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Engineering.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Bonker. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.
